title: How Nginx Went From Being the Little Engine That Could to Become the Fork of the Day
description:
On Valentine's day a developer for the popular open-source web server platform Nginx announced a fork of the project to create FreeNginx. Here's what you need to know about the fork, and what it means to the future of Nginx.

The post How Nginx Went From Being the Little Engine That Could to Become the Fork of the Day appeared first on FOSS Force.
